title: Stuns in statistics for game end.
body: Because I play Leona a lot I noticed that there's not a stun counter in the statistics it would be useful to know the amount of stuns I get normally vs when im doing bad etc etc. Please add a stun counter/cc counter in statistics thank you.

replies.body: This shows up in post-game stats as "Crowd Control Score." However, that particular statistic doesn't show up online (here's your [latest match](matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3159642905/232105675?tab=stats), for example), so if you want to see that you're limited to the match history in the client itself.

fun fact, Nocturne cheeses the utility score.
Something about his Fear pads the utility score way way waaaaay too much.
